turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me place an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. What starbucks should i place an order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you put it in at the Starbucks on Germantown Ave in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i know the place. Awesome, and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Could I get a black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and would you like that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and did you want to keep it with whole milk, or select another option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. So the order is 1 grande black and white mocha with soy milk from starbucks on german town avenue in chestnut hills. Did you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you make me whipped cream light?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, i've added light whipped cream to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. Should i order the black and white mocha now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, i've placed the order. It'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've also sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's perfect. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
